Detailed Description

wilson fermionic field

Example: 

/// fermi_field psi(lattice,nc);
/// mdp_site x(lattice);
/// forallsites(x)
///    for(int spin=0; spin<4; spin++)
///      for(int i=0; i<nc; i++)
///        psi(x,spin,i)=0.0+0.0*I;
///
